basic.description:
An examination of the political and social history of the Balkans from Napoleonic times to the present.
LEARNING HOURS    360 (72S;288P)
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: The Balkans in Modern Times

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE    A Grade of C+ in 6.0 units from HIST 300-329 and registration in a HIST Major or Medial Plan.
